website_summaries.verdict: With its classic fringed bob style and cool pastel purple color, this wig works for a range of costumes.
pros: Looks and feels soft and realistic - shiny, but not too shiny
Users report it's easy to style and isn't damaged by high temperatures
Bangs are of a good length
A very popular choice with cosplayers
cons: Too thick for some users' tastes

customer_reviews.title: ... and I must say this wig feels natural is pretty soft doesn't shed
customer_reviews.text: I have all 4 colors black light brown dark brown and red and I must say this wig feels natural is pretty soft doesn't shed .......best wig quality and price.............the worst part is taking it off just wish my hair was naturally like this I highly recommend it ......if the wig is a bit shinny spray some dry shampoo and your ready to go....highly recommend weather you want to change your hair and look different or if your loosing your hair or your going through chemo......
customer_reviews.author: shelly monteria

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments when I wear this! The bangs make the wig look so realistic and cute. It comes with a shine, but not a fake one and it's nothing a little dry shampoo can't fix if you're not digging it. I have really curly hair and instead of ruining it by straightening I pop this bad boy on and bam! No heat damage for this girl :-)
customer_reviews.author: Little Leslie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. JUST BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I wasn't digging the front being curled under but I used a flat iron on low and after I use a brush to flatten it back down so it would be straight. So gorgeous. It transformed me. I wore my hair in 2 braids and flipped the braids up and used bobby pins to pin it against the already braided hair. (I have curly mid back hair). It stood flat and looked perfect!! Can be used for everyday or costume purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly on top of my should length Afro
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this wig! I have so much hair and op out of buying short wigs...it came with a fishnet hair cap that kept it all in. The bangs are uneven, but it's cute. Low shine, doesn't look like a typical synthetic wig. Photo on the left it my normal hair and photo on the right is with the wig with provided wig cap.
customer_reviews.author: Lovespy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It fit nicely and looked amazing when I straightened it; used it for a cosplay and trust me, wigs that last conventions wonderfully are very good indeed. Now I didn't use a straightening iron, I pinned it to a cheap styrofoam head that you can get at craft stores, then just stuck that on a 2liter full of water, boiled water and poured it over. Just be careful you don't burn yourself, and it works beautifully. Just thought I'd put it out there if someone was curious. Its very soft and comfortable for a wig, and at such a good price~
customer_reviews.author: Sue in CT

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review = Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this wig once before- and because I loved it so much I bought another when the one I had was damaged from so much use. This wig I received is an entirely different product, noticeably thinner and shorter, and came cut unevenly. I wouldn't have bought it again if I had known it would be an entirely different wig (The wig came very quickly and in great condition! It is a little shorter than the picture would make you think (that mannequin has a long neck) But the bangs have and extra layer to make them look healthier and not flat, and the wig does well with heat! I love it overall and would 10/10 buy again!)
customer_reviews.author: caffinatedkitti

customer_reviews.title: Good wig. Not for small heads
customer_reviews.text: As much I love this wig, it was way too big for me! Wonderful product though if you plan on getting it. It's very soft and looks more realistic than I expected. Only shiny in some lightings. I made it work for me and used it for a photoshoot and got some lovely pictures. It does look fake in some angles but it's a wig, what do you expect? It did have some frayed and melted looking pieces by the net near the bangs (attached some pics) but I'm not sure if that's normal since it's my first wig.
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: Silky pretty
customer_reviews.text: This wig is perfect for the price. It's soft and silky out of the package. It actually looks just like the picture and comes with a wig cap which is super useful. I wanted to give it a 4.5 because the only thing wrong with it is that there are no combs and the cap is a little bit. Everything else is great. Super cute... I will probably buy other colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia francois

customer_reviews.title: Hair tracks were loose and sticking out when I took ...
customer_reviews.text: Hair tracks were loose and sticking out when I took it out of the package, this is not what I was expecting to be paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrion

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and mod looking!
customer_reviews.text: This wig is so cute! An adorable little bob! Even though it's synthetic hair, it's feels like good quality, and you can't beat the price! I got it for my mom to replace her old blue wig that she wears for Mardi Gras, and she just loves it! Isn't she precious? :)
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Love this wig!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wig! Feels and looks real. So happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wig
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Not shiny Soft Fits beautifully (considering I have really large /thick hair, it wasn't tight at all. You could wear it for hours without any soreness) Thick/A lot of hair There's a scalp part at the crown to make it more realistic Minimal shedding Cons (these are minor in my opinion): It's shorter than expected. It says 14" but I measured mine, and I have 12". The bangs could use one more inch but that's just my preference Overall: It's great wig. This wig is high quality for the price, and it's pretty realistic. I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: I got the pink!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pink wig, the one that looks like an ashy light pink and shorter in length on the model picture. Very nice and comfortable. I tried to straighten the front curl out but it didn't do much. I didn't want too high of heat tho, I'll try again. Definitely worth buying this brand if you want a short wig. The bangs are a little choppy on the sides but not horrible. I might be able to fix them.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This wig is great for the price - worked well for my Tina Belcher Cosplay.
customer_reviews.author: xxiaoyy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: First off, this wig is the most comfortable wig I own! I know this for a fact because usually after just an hour, I start getting itchy and fussy with other wigs. With this one, I made it 4 hours with out scratching or tugging on it once. It felt really natural on my head which is so hard to find! I did have to shorten the bangs a bit (and I have a big forehead!), but it wasn't too bad. I used a beard trimmer which made it easy. This wig worked perfect for my Beetlejuice costume!
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: I love this wig
customer_reviews.text: Cute lil wig. Mine came with a black netted wig cap. I love this wig, my only concern with it is there are no combs on the inside to hold it in place. It stays on well, but because of the lack of combs, you have to constantly keep adjusting it. My advice if you buy this wig is to have booby pins ready OR fashion combs into this wig yourself. Other than that, great purchase. The hair is soft, it does not tangle (even though there's not much hair to get tangled, i figured i should include that), and it really does look natural. If not for the lack of combs, I'd definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: ShaCaJa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wig!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 4 wigs so far (newly bald) and this is my favorite. It's not the most realistic looking because it's a little too shiny but I apply some powder and/or dry shampoo to fix that. I like the way the hair moves on the wig plus the hair is thick so no see-through spots. I will most definitely purchase another one from this seller and would recommend it if the hairstyle works for you. It's similar to the way I wore my hair.
customer_reviews.author: ButtonsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, i read all the other reviews ehich were very good, but still had medium expectations... This wig is fantastic! It swings and moves like real hair (not all stiff and snarled) .....it looks like real hair (not like overly shiny Barbie hair) and it was really priced well...... I ordered black and its actually very dark brown/ black but looks *black* which makes it look very real.....loooove it. My Halloween costume is gonna be awwwesome! Thx!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Lovely Color, Not Enough Hair =/
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave it three stars and not four is because the top part (the thing that attaches to your head) is very bulky. If you don't style the hair just right, you can see the top part. I believe this is due to there not being enough actual hair. But, this is my first wig so I may not have a single clue what I'm talking about. All in all, very pretty color but not worth the price overall. But I won't be wearing it all the time, only to our weekly Dungeons and Dragons sessions. (:
customer_reviews.author: TrishDaDish

customer_reviews.title: Wig sis
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has had a plethora of really unfortunate haircuts, I decided to go with wigs so I don't wind up looking like a gawky gecko. This wig actually looks natural, and I got a lot of compliments when I wore it ^^ The fringe tickles my forehead, but other than that it was super comfy to wear. I could even wear a flapper headband with this! You got to adjust it though because it makes it bunch up so you look like you got a cone-head.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wilbanks

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Beautiful Wig
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This wig is beyond worth the money! Super face shipping, came in near package and includes a wig cap! The hair is very dense and the pink color is so perfect ! The wig is very soft and not overly shiny like most synthetic wigs ! I bought this jut for something fun and different to wear to a concert and it was so comfortable I forgot i had it on!! Would love more colors and styles!
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Buy your wigs at a beauty store!
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled!! Sometimes the cheap route is never best when it comes to certain things. #1 Cheap quality. #2 I've paid less than $15 for better quality wigs. Looked obviously cheap, felt cheap and not a realistic looking wig #not suited for everyday wear #clearly costume DRUM ROLL: NO RETURN POLICY
customer_reviews.author: parc

customer_reviews.title: Lovely style wig for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations for this wig, considering the price...but I was very pleasantly surprised. It's a pretty well made wig, the tracks are full and close, so there isn't any gapping. I've had very few strands fall out so far (which is pretty impressive), the hair itself isn't too shiny or platic looking, and can pass as natural hair. The bangs required a bit of trimming - as is expected with any wig that has bangs. There are no combs inside, so a couple well placed bobby pins may be needed, though I have been wearing it daily with a wig band or wig cap and both have kept it in place just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Warpurr

customer_reviews.title: silky smooth and flattering wig
customer_reviews.text: I adore this wig, it is surprisingly smooth and silky to the touch, and falls straight down with a slight curve, as is shown in the product photo. My friend also bought the same wig, we were dressing up as a pair of cat burglars (photo attached - you see us harassing a hotel guest and trying to steal her jewelry in broad daylight - so brazen!!). I have worn this wig twice (wore it as part of a vampire costume for Halloween, took no pics of that) and stored it carefully, and it seems to hold its smooth shape.
customer_reviews.author: VALERIE L KELLER

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: The wig arrived just as picture. It was soft and shiny as well as straight. Not much styling required. I did have to trim the bangs just a bit but otherwise it's perfect! The adjustable clips really help hold it in place. Cant wait for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great look!
customer_reviews.text: I have received many compliments about this wig. I purchased it in honey blonde and the color is fantastic. It has enough variation to look extremely real. I also purchased this wig in wine red and I love that one as well. The hair is very fine and looks realistic. It is easy to wear, with no excessive itching. I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for a wig party and the only thing I changed was cutting the bangs a little shorter. Might’ve been my head shape but I didn’t like that the bangs went into my eyes so I trimmed about 1/2 inch. The hair obviously feels synthetic but it was thick and covered all of the net of the actual wig. It came with a hair net and was silky and brushed. I didn’t use any heat on it so I don’t have any opinion about the heat resistance and I just store it on a mannequin head to keep the shape and ensure it doesn’t get tangly in case I want to wear it again.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzi

customer_reviews.title: Not enough hair in back, thin you can see my hair through wig!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this wig will be returned! I brought it for a Halloween costume but I also planned on wearing it the entire 4 days while on vacation. The pictures should explain it all! I 😔
customer_reviews.author: Stacy-Leigh

customer_reviews.title: BEST $16 EVER SPENT
customer_reviews.text: The price and quality of the wig it's the best 16 bucks I've ever spent. The bangs come just below the eyebrows and the hair rests lightly on your shoulders. The wig is very thick and the hair doesn't fall out, even after a through brush. Will definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for Halloween but wear it every weekend
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised by the quality of this wig. When I first unboxed it there were quite a few stray hairs falling off but I haven’t had that issue since and have worn it consistently to bars and clubs on the weekend in order to unleash my alter ego. I have had people ask if it’s a wig but could’ve been fooled and likewise I have been complimented for my hair. I wear it confidently and it fits comfortably so I’m very happy with it. My one complaint is that I can’t get it to straighten. I use low heat but it seems like I’ll have to increase but I’m nervous to do any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I have rather a large head and lots and lots of long hair so finding a wig I can wear comfortably for hours is hard but it's held up very well. Looks very futuristic or Anime. I don't cosplay but I think it would work amazing for cons. I have not needed to style it other than cutting the bangs. Would defiantly recommend to those interested in buying.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cope

customer_reviews.title: This is for cosplay and costumes so for the price I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Warning item is not refundable/exchangeable... I was unsure about the color I ordered, and after recieving decided I needed the darker color but I cant exchange it now, this is my fault but just a heads up. I will make it work, so upon inspection the quality will wirk for what I need it for. It does shed quite a bit and did include a wig cap. This is for cosplay and costumes so for the price I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pink wig wasn’t for me
customer_reviews.text: The bangs were so long and I didn’t want to trim them so I would mess them up so I had to return. Also the bangs are very transparent for anyone looking for a fuller look this color wig wasn’t the best. May try different wig for this seller in the future but not too happy with the light pink wig.
customer_reviews.author: Perla

customer_reviews.title: Overall, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The texture is great, and it's not too thick or too thin. It's the perfect amount! It is a little shiny but for $15 who could complain; nothing a little dry shampoo won't fix! It's not itchy and not heavy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this wig because I was going to Lost Lands 2018 music festival and I have an undercut and its awesome to wear wigs and experiment on different styles. So I bought this and it stays on! believe me when I tell you this wig will not fall off your head. If you know what head-banging is, I did it for 4 days straight and this wig did not fall off. Also, normally synthetic wigs get all tangled and ugly, this one a simple brush strokes and BAM looking like a million bucks. I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: vilma salamanca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect costume wig!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect wig for my daughter's Halloween Mal (from Disney Descendants) costume. It is an adult size wig and fits me great. But I was able to adjust the size (using the straps inside) and it worked perfectly for her (she is 5), she was running around and the wig stayed on. It is a great quality especially for the price. The color is like a lilac purple, super cute.
customer_reviews.author: The Bragging Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used wigs ever but I thought for the price this was a good wig. Was a little shiny, but it's green so it's not going to look 100% natural. I did straighten in on low heat and the bangs were super long so I trimmed them. I could have also just done a side sweep with them if I wasn't comfortable trimming, but I have a friend who uses wigs alot and I watched several youtube videos so I gave trimming a shot. But overall I thought this was a good quality wig, didn't get hot when wearing and stayed in place. I used it for St. Patricks day partying.
customer_reviews.author: mck

customer_reviews.title: Cute wig!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute wig, and looks really great for the price. I purchased the purple and black wigs for various costumes. It came in great shape, and was easy to plop on- I have A LOT of hair and it all held in very well for the entire night and was not uncomfortable. Definitely a synthetic wig, but for the price it was perfect for costume use. Only note- it comes with a wig cap which works, but I ended up buying a separate one that worked a lot better (again, I have a ton of hair)
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Gebler

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, silky feeling BETTER than hair. I bought the red wine one, hoping it would be deep, darker -just like the picture. I'd love to send it back for the brownish one. I really didn't want to stand out. The cut is cute & I love the inside part of the wig- whatever it's called. This seems excellent quality, my fault, srong color. To return & reorder would seem silly as I pay ship & handling. If you know your color its more than worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ky WomanTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The hair itself is pretty perfect, it looks real, no fake doll hair shininess, soft, doesn't tangle. There is a tiny bump on top when i wear it, i think because the cap is on the larger side (so definitely good for big headed people) but it's not noticeable. It's pretty thick as well tho there is a spot on top where the wefts are visible if the hair moves too much so i have to be careful. But all in all it's really good for the price, cute and comfortable to throw on once in a while when my daily use good wig is needing a break.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Revenge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, real looking.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is an amazing wig. I bought it for my mom and she loved it! I ordered her some more so she could always have a nice looking one. As she gets older her hair is very thin. She still likes to look nice and this wig does the job. She says she has received many compliments about her hair and how nice it looks "today". She doesn't get the sense that people realize it is a wig!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Looked nicer than it turned out to be.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it sheds constantly at the lightest tug. The hair comes right out of the cap in large chunks, even while simply wearing it shed hairs everywhere I went. I love the color and shape and how natural it looks. The price is amazing. It is a nice enough for a one night costume party or something, but I hoped I’d get to wear it more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous! But, not for a tiny head!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous wig - and for the price, exceptional. I am very small (barely 4'10"), with a tiny head. I knew, without trying it on, that it was way too big and too much hair and bangs for me. I was disappointed because it is very soft and feels like real, well conditioned hair. It came with a very nice wig cap and was beautifully packaged in a netting. If you are clever with cutting bangs or snipping hair, and have a normal sized head, give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Loeb

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first product review for amazon. This wig absolutely sucks. The cut is extremely uneven and jagged. I tried curling, straightening and there’s nothing I can do to make it look okay. I hate it so much. It sucks even more that I can not return it. I put my hope into this wig after reading the reviews. Ugggghhhh!!! Please don’t buy. eNilecor if you’re reading this... please give me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Isse

customer_reviews.title: ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: this wig just wasn't what i expected the bangs are just way to long and i tried cutting them and they just didn't cut right for me like my other wigs do the color isn't bad which is why i ordered it and was kind of excited about gettiing it but it just doesn't do it for my face and their is no going back and fixing it after i messed up the bangs if you don't like long bangs don't get this wig other than that the color was great and it came on time and also came with a free wig cap which is always handy
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Stacy

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: It's nothing like the picture. I ordered a short blond wig for a powergirl costume next weekend and I have to return this! It wouldn't have bothered me if the wig was a little darker, but the thing I received was BROWN with chunks of BLOND highlight for some reason???? and it was super shiny???? like I'm so confused at how they even think the picture is close. definitely returning and totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wig
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cosplay I was doing. It's actually a pretty nice wig, but I have a couple complaints. First of all the way it fit on my head, the bangs were waaay too long. Also, I wouldn't recommend cutting the hair. When I did, the hair that was cut was really itchy and irritated the exposed skin. However, I'll point out that I have pretty much no experience with wigs, so if this is normal then just ignore my ignorance, haha. One nice thing was that it came with a wig cap. :)
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE eNilecor!!!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously LOVE every wig I’ve gotten from eNilecor. They’re so fun and typically have great thickness to them (no limp, fake, stringy strands). I also have this same style bob in blue and black and have had so much fun with them! They just need a bang trim — no crappy part plucking to deal with. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was in a play and she needed a wig in white. We were on a tight budget and chose this one based off of reviews. We loved the way it looked. The bangs were a little long but we cut them carefully and it was perfect. Very nice quality at an affordable price. She is using it again for Halloween. We highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A Martin

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough, I recommend
customer_reviews.text: This wig is pretty good for the price. It’s very soft and not too shiny. My complaints would have to be that the bangs are entirely too long, then ends are curled in too far taking away from the length and making it too girly/child like and even on low heat with heat shield the hair is not wanting to straighten much at all. But nonetheless the wig wig serve its purpose for my cleopatra costume but that’s about it
customer_reviews.author: katelyn c.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and creates a dramatic look.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wig for a play I’m in. It’s absolutely beautiful for the price. Even though it’s synthetic, it looks and feels like real hair. I would totally wear it out if I wanted to change up my look. It has straps that allow you to tighten the cap underneath for a better fit, as well as 2 combs. Very well made and lots of hair. Very nice and dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: Skruffy the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Not a solid wig.
customer_reviews.text: Sheds. Quite a lot. My bangs had a mostly smooth, uniform texture, but there were some weird, crinkly bits disrupting the smooth fall of the bangs...and the bangs had some sort of residue that made them a bit clumpy, and not as free flowing and moving as the rest of the hair. I am not a fan of this wig.
customer_reviews.author: SMyvz

customer_reviews.title: Cute wig just not my style
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wig just to try out different styles. This would probably be perfect for Cosplay. Not everyday wear like I'm looking for. The part is fixed with heavy streaking. I'm past that stage for me. Its definitely cute but just not for me. It's heavy and shiny. The length of the wig is nice and cute. If it were lace, I would probably have kept it and sprayed it with temporary hair color to lessen the chunky blonde on top. That would also take down the shine a bit too. But I think I will keep looking something more to my liking. This is not a bad wig. Its just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Primazon

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY 😍
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED it, everywhere I went, stores, meeting friends they thought it was REAL, I was a bit skeptical but the reviews did help alot, only thing I dislike about wigs is how hot it gets my head and it tends to travel to my face but oh well thats the price we pay to look pretty and change our hair color in a matrer of seconds :) however I would totally reccomend this wig, I look forward to buying more in different colors :) hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Selena Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The cut is perfect as is the color
customer_reviews.text: This wig is straight up gorgeous! The cut is perfect as is the color. It arrived quickly, packaged well, and with no flaws. It is also the first wig I've purchased that came with instructions! If I had to make one negative critique - the under layers are a bit darker than the photo. However I think this adds to the "natural" look of this wig.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A nice wig, but not as long as the photo suggests.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a production of a play for the character of Cleopatra. It's a nice enough wig for the price, but the picture and the description totally misrepresent its length. The curl at the bottom lined up alongside our actress's jaw, not mid-neck, and there was no measurable part of the wig that was 14" long (and we took a tape measure to it). I assume the mannequin head is a distorted representation of an actual human head. It would be good if the seller used a different photograph, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley Sanders

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been getting compliments on this wig all day I love the way the bangs are chopped. The hair can take heat, however I recommend not using high heat. I used my Hot Beauty flat iron on it in order to remove the bump, and the hair started to static as if I put my finger in a socket. Overall decent quality for the price. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: KoKo's Kouture Closet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hiding teal hair.
customer_reviews.text: I love this wig. I had to get it for work because my boss disapproved of my blue hair. Everyone thought I dyed my hair back. It is smooth and fits well I did have to trim the bangs but it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Books and Brownies

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: One of the better wigs I've bought; great quality for the price. Inclusion of a wig cap was a really nice touch! I have a pretty small head for an adult, and this fit very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: LCH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Kiki’s Delivery cosplay!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wig! Nice and full. I bought it for a Kiki’s Delivery cosplay and am very happy with it. Heat resistance is great, used my straightener on it in the lowest setting (380F) and it worked great. For once a wig with bangs that didn’t need extensive trimming on the bangs. I actually did thin it out with some thinning shears and trimmed the bangs a tiny bit but it really wasn’t necessary. It was shiny, but that’s to be expected with synthetic wigs. Dry shampoo worked great to take some of the shine down.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Elle

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: The wing is not good at all, it's very shinny and the hair strands come out very easy. I was being lazy ordering a wig off Amazon when I should have gone to the beauty supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Wig
customer_reviews.text: This was for a spoof, so I wasn't that concerned with how it looked. It came with a small net to put my hair in, which was nice. It fit fine and the cut was nice. It worked for my purposes, but I wouldn't have worn this as a substitute for my real hair. I think it would be too hot for one thing.
customer_reviews.author: Magillil

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING.......
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY INCREDIBLE.........couldn't believe high quality look and feeling just like real hair. Very comfortable and lightweight needing no work what so ever......just put on and your set looking as natural as if your own hair. Color described as light brown actually was more like a medium auburn. Simply love it going back to the way I wore my hair before getting sick, losing my hair, returning but losing it's fullness thinning out simply do to aging. Now, I can get that look back of having a full, thick head of hair I always had and miss. Highly recommend and certainly can't beat the price for the quality received.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Way nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: Way nicer than expected. I bought this wig for a costume and was pleasantly surprised at the quality and the fullness. The dark brown color is so pretty and natural-looking. I actually had several people ask me if I cut and straightened my hair. I wore my actual hair in a crown-braid underneath, and you couldn't even tell. The ends hit me just under my chin, not as low as on the mannequin in the picture, but it was comfortable and cute. Also very easy to put on and wear. No shifting or pinching. Wore it all night. In general, I was very pleased. For the price, I was blown away!
customer_reviews.author: Gypzi_00

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was everything i expected. The quality is super good it feels softer than my own hair lol. But for the price this wig is super amazing! Once you hook the straps on the wig it wont come off at all. And i like how they added in the wigcap 😌
customer_reviews.author: Emily M

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I'll have to make sure to take a photo with these wigs but I have bought more expensive wigs from Wig is Fashion and these are hands down better, they came nicely packaged and I loved that there is really no shine to them so they look natural and I haven't even brushed them out yet! Little shorter than the photo but otherwise it's great! I bought the short bob in red, the longer party wig in 1B/light blonde. The red is a bit shorter of a bob than it appears but it is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Leinen

customer_reviews.title: The color looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The color looks exactly like the picture. It does shed A lot! It's thick and I was able to use my flat iron on it on a low setting. It fits my head very well and doesn't feel heavy. When you first take it out the package it's not straight at the bottom. The first picture is after I pressed out the curl. The other two is what it looks like straight out the package. Hope the pictures are helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wig for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is awesome. I didnt have to do anything to it straight out if the box. I may trim the bangs slightly eventually...but its not enough of an issue for me to care. The picture I included shows the bangs at ideal height because I had a bun that raised the hair up instead of in the wig cap more evenly distributed. It didn't seem as itchy or tight on my brain like my wig about triple the price. The hair was also thick and moves nicely. Color is a very pretty deep red.
customer_reviews.author: s2dent4life

customer_reviews.title: Color is exactly like picture
customer_reviews.text: I love this wig so much for raves and festivals! the color is amazing. Mine had minimal shedding and the bangs worked for me face. I straightened mine out a little bit because I didn't like how much it swooped under my face, I just made sure not to keep the straightener on it very long.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fancy hair!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved wearing fit for my 30th. Instead of a dirty 30 I did a crazy 30! I had everyone wear wigs and go to Dave and busters it was so much fun! The wig was amazing! It came perfect. No tangles or frizz! It fit perfect on my head and I got so many compliments on it! I bought my sister the pink one and she love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Length is closer to chin length than the pictured mid chin/shoulder length
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Leeloo costume and it worked great! It's cute, clean, new, nice. I think the overall length is a little short than on the model, mine falls just under my chin and not mid-chin/shoulder like pictured, but for me that's better :) it handled up well on a night out on the town!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: There's better out there in the same price range.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several wigs both long and short, and this is the only that's too thin in the back. So if you buy a light color and have dark hair you may want to wear a light colored wig cap, otherwise it will be easy to see your dark hair in the back. Also the light pink looked a bit flat. Definitely not as good looking as the pics.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: When I finally received them ( they didn't ship for 14 days past the purchase date and then only after my prompting) the packagi
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the black and sliver wigs. When I finally received them ( they didn't ship for 14 days past the purchase date and then only after my prompting) the packaging was good, what's I'd expect from a wig seller. The black wig was wearable straight out of the packaging, although I did trim the bangs a bit to fit my style. Minimal shedding,zero tangling, very full wig with no see through spots. I love it. The silver wig however is slightly different. The bangs are more sparse and it is very very shiny, to the point I would only wear it as a costume piece. Still fun to play with, but not appropriate for public.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality For Synthetic
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wig, it’s super soft! I trimmed the bangs and used it for a photo shoot and plan on wearing it out once the clubs open up again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver/ last minute hair disaster
customer_reviews.text: In loveeeee with this wig. (Black wig) It’s dark so it can look pretty natural. Everyone complicated it, said it looks fabulous and cute. Is a Lil shiny, but what synthetic hair isn’t. You can find good,easy, short tips on YouTube to make it Lil less shiny. It curls and crumpled with heat. Make it a little messy to have that natural look. All in all this was a last minute life saver. I’m so happy I got it. Will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its an awful item
customer_reviews.text: It isn't close to the pink color in the pic. Its not the exact style. Its stringy and fuzzy and looks like something you dug out of the garbage can. IT's just a awful product all around! I want my money back but they dont take returns . Wish I had known that and maybe I would not have ordered it in the first place!
customer_reviews.author: stephen delong

customer_reviews.title: great quality! I wore this to a bachelorette party ...
customer_reviews.text: great quality! I wore this to a bachelorette party and danced all night in the summer heat and my wig stayed perfectly, even on my tiny head!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wig because of how many good reviews there were, and I wasn't disappointed. I'm planning to use it for a halloween costume but now I'm tempted to wear it out more regularly! The wig itself is super soft and not too shiny, it actually looks somewhat realistic. I straightened some pieces because the hair was all slightly swooped in the same direction. I will update with some pictures once I've modified it a bit more. My goal is to make it as realistic as possible by trimming some of the front to make the bangs fade more naturally into the rest of the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right side is pretty, downhill from there...
customer_reviews.text: Cockeyed- left side is about 5 inches longer than the right side. I am going to have to bring it to my stylist to have it cut. Also, the bangs are down past my nose. Like the picture, the right side is very pretty, the front and left side are questionable to grotesque.
customer_reviews.author: Verukka

customer_reviews.title: the black is better than the burgundy
customer_reviews.text: I initially wrote a review for the black and when I came back to review the burgundy i realized they had my black hair review for the burgundy as well. well the two aren't made equally. the burgundy is a lot more cosplay looking and shinny and too full. plus the ends don't curl under the right way for both sides. overall just a really bad buy
customer_reviews.author: Kenesha

customer_reviews.title: Poorly cut, uneven bangs...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wig because I didn't want to have to cut bangs in one myself. Looks like my plan failed, considering the bangs on this were poorly cut, uneven, and blunt in a bad way. The wig itself was nice quality, but I'm lucky I had scissors with me at the event I was at in order to fix the terrible bangs it came it.
customer_reviews.author: Uncanny Megan

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: It was fabulous. Purchased it for a 1920s party and could not have been more pleased. Wore it comfortably for 8 straight hours. Will use it next for a steampunk costume. My nearly waist length hair fit nicely into the included netted cap. Loved the cut/style of the wig. Received lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl14

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! If you want to be a different person for a night ladies, here's your ticket! This wig is AWESOME! Don't expect real human hair quality (obviously), but you can can totally pass it off! I absolutely love this wig and will be purchasing many more colors. Super easy to put on for first timers!
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: Nice wig
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for fun and I’m pretty impressed with it. It does look like a wig but I didn’t expect or need it to look totally realistic. It covers my hair and fits well. I got the blond and it’s really shiny looking so I took other reviewer’s advice and sprayed it with dry shampoo. That helped some.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Love this wig!
customer_reviews.text: I always have problems with wigs and headbands staying on my head, but I had absolutely no problems with this wig! Stayed on all night, even when I took a very short nap on my friends couch. Doesn't look like your average cheap costume wig you'd buy from the store, great quality!! Bangs were a little too long for me, but a quick trim will fix that!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: amazing price for amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for a ramona flowers costume and it worked great! I cut and heat styled the wig and it held up really well for the price. i would recommend buying a lot of bobby pins though, so the wig won't slide around your head like it did for me (hense why the bangs are so far)
customer_reviews.author: eva💖💝💘💞💓

customer_reviews.title: STIFF WHERE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wig for a bachelorette party that I am going to in the next couple weeks and we all thought it would be fun to wear a wig. I did NOT expect such high quality hair for a wig that was for this price. It is soooo smooth and silky - better than my own hair. I tried it on quickly and it suits me well. I say buy it for halloween or for a night out with your girls. It will make a difference!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Cute cosplay wig, not for normal wear
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty wig, but for a black woman like me, this would not be considered "natural" looking hair. The texture is just a tad too shiny, but not quite doll like. It very obviously looks like a wig. It's still very pretty and the cut and color look exactly like the pic - no mods needed! The wig is medium density and you are not able to see the wig cap underneath. Also, the bangs look easily trim-able.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, soft and looks natural
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a bachelorette party, wasn't exactly what I wanted, could use some trimming and styling, did not take a straightener to it as many other users have in fear of it melting.. but overall it was great and other girls that bought from same vendor also raved about liking theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Pata

customer_reviews.title: Nice but defective and not an option to exchange.
customer_reviews.text: This wig just came today. I opened it and it is defective. Part of a layer was missed by the sewing machine so it is hanging down and there is a bald spot. I tried to exchange it but there wasn't an option to exchange or replace it. When I pressed the button it said this item is not returnable. I really like it and want to exchange it for one that is not defective. It seems to be well made except for the defect. I guess I'm just out my money. I'm sad because I probably would have bought it in more colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Jane D.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the picture and it's adorable. The wig feels like very conditioned hair to the touch. I felt the bangs were too long, however. I don't like my bangs below my eyebrows. That's how they look on the mannequin's head in the picture. I was just hoping they wouldn't be so long, since others who reviewed the wig said they didn't have a problem. So I guess depending on your head shape/size and personal preference, you may have to trim them (it's not a big deal, really). Everything else with the wig was perfect and I can't believe the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Noel  Vose

customer_reviews.title: This is such an amazing wig for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing wig for the price! I got these for my makeup page on Instagram. I have it in pink and lavender and am debating getting it in blue too! The pink one has almost course hair that didn't have the "fake wig" look which I loved so I ordered the lavender. That one was a bit more on the shiny side but with some spray on dry shampoo it was good to go! The lavender has a subtle glow under blacklight too which is super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best quality available at this price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wigs. The fit and quality is unbeatable. They're easy to modify, as they're made so well to begin with. I perform, and I will always reach for these ones. They breathe, aren't terribly heavy, and are easy to "touch up" during the day. They also don't seem to shed AT ALL. After 40+ wears, it still looks the same as it did the day it arrived. I actually have 0 complaints. This is the perfect wig for day to day wear, a night on the town, or working a stage.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Larocque

customer_reviews.title: nothing like the picture, be prepared to re-style
customer_reviews.text: The 12" white has a lovely color and is very soft, but it is poorly made. I didn't expect a lot for the price, but the bangs are maybe an inch and a half across and very sparse. Seeing a bit of the base due to the light color is one thing, but there is a lot of completely uncovered lacing in the front. It is totally unwearable as is. If you're going to adjust it some (I'm pulling from one side over the front to cover the front lace) then it's decent other than some shedding.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Rushworth

customer_reviews.title: Great first wig!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first wig I have ever bought, and this is also one of the first reviews I’ve ever written on a product, but I felt obligated to write this after having such an awesome experience with making this purchase!! The wig is so soft and hardly looks synthetic especially after applying some dry shampoo. I wore it with a hate to hide the artificial hairline and all of my friends thought I’d chopped and dyed my long brown hair. I definitely recommend and have already purchased a different color!! I cut the bangs so they were more choppy and grays (personal preference) and I also straightened the wig (which it took great to).
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Starrett

customer_reviews.title: Product nice quality but my item was damaged/defective, return process easy
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and had good quality hair, not too shiny or thin or anything, nice full coverage, except that one of the wefts at the very top of the wig had come untied and was coming further undone and there wasn't enough string attached for me to tie it myself, so I returned it (and ended up using the refund for something else rather than a replacement). Since it was nice quality other than the defect, I would like to give this item another shot when I can, and will leave an additional review when I get around to purchasing the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Remy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Go Pink!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed when I derived this wig. I'm a breast cancer big supporter, and wear this to fundraising events. It's a beautiful color, so thick and feels so real. It is extremely well made. I even flat ironed it, it's a great cut. Really love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, realistic and soft. Best wig i have every gotten
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Halloween costume but it looks soooo realistic! The hair is soft and shiny, beautiful color and shape. HOWEVER, you NEED TO BUY A DIFFERENT WIG CAP. The one that comes with it is cheap and will not hold. You also need to pin this in certain spots to prevent it from falling off..i do like they add a clip in the back of the wig, so once its on you can clip it to secure it tighter. This is by far the best wig i have ever gotten and ive spent way more than this before.
customer_reviews.author: Meena U.

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic, great for cosplay
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic fine hair, confused it with my own Asian hair! Used for a cosplay but would consider using it to go out. A lot of volume, initial shape not the most flattering, had to trim down to at least 25% less. @suzyqt4u for Mirror's Edge cosplay
customer_reviews.author: Azura

customer_reviews.title: Great wig, blonde is a little off...
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of the wig, and it's super easy to put on. The blonde is more of a yellowish tinge though, it definitely doesn't look like a natural blonde color. It works okay for me, I just need it for a murder mystery party, but if someone is looking for a true blonde color, this might not be the best one. Other than that, I LOVE it! It didn't shed when I wore it, and it feels really nice. I would definitely get it in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Bus

product_meta.title: eNilecor Short Bob Hair Wigs 12" Straight with Flat Bangs Synthetic Colorful Cosplay Daily Party Wig for Women Natural As Real Hair+ Free Wig Cap (Lavender Purple)
feature_bullets: eNilecor is a register trademark in US, we provide the high quality product with the natural color and good texture,the colored short bob wigs just look just like real hair

100% breathable rose net within the network make you feel comfortable when you wear it.There are two adjustment straps at two side of the wig, which can be intertwined to a fix position to suit different head sizes
Length: 30cm/12 inch,Short colorful lavender purple bob wig with bangs looks natural for women
Put the wigs on the wig stand for storage when you not wear it
Fashionable and stylish short hair wigs looks natural, real, very pretty and feminine, soft touch.You can wear it for parties,halloween,cosplay, daily use

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
